text: eninum (napiye!) Avarkalil kalviyil uruti mikkavarkalum, unmai nampikkaiyalarkalum, um mitu arulappatta (ivvetat)taiyum, umakku munnar arulappattirunta (vetankal ya)varraiyum meyyakave nampikkai kolvarkal tolukaiyaiyum kataippitittut tolupavarkal; jakattum kotuttu varupavarkal; allahvaiyum iruti nalaiyum nampikkai kontavarkal. Akiya ivarkalukku (marumaiyil) makattana kuliyai nam kotuppom
